title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
4 point(s) maximum

Claim | Support (1 point each row; 4 points maximum)

KAR affects timing

• germination starts earlier/sooner/faster/quicker

KAR affects percentage

• higher percentage of seeds germinate in the presence of only KAR

TMB affects timing

• germination starts later/slower

TMB affects percentage

• lower percentage of seeds germinate in presence of only TMB
